tool_description: Evaluates how weather conditions affect wild edible availability, quality, and optimal harvest timing for specific species.

weather_data_start.description: Start date for weather analysis period

weather_data_end.description: End date for weather analysis period

extreme_events.description: Notable weather events: drought, flood, frost, hailstorm, windstorm

error_messages: Date range invalid: End date must be after start date
Array length mismatch: Temperature and precipitation arrays must have same length
Invalid temperature values: All temperatures must be between -50 and 60 Celsius
Invalid precipitation values: All precipitation values must be 0 or positive
Invalid humidity values: All humidity values must be between 0 and 100
Invalid extreme event: Use one of [drought, flood, frost, hailstorm, windstorm]
Data period too long: Maximum 365 days of weather data supported
usage: Provide species name, weather analysis period, and daily weather arrays. The tool analyzes weather impacts on plant development and harvest quality.

overall_weather_impact.description: Overall weather effect: very_positive, positive, neutral, negative, very_negative

quality_adjustment.description: Quality multiplier from 0.0 to 2.0 based on weather

abundance_adjustment.description: Abundance multiplier from 0.0 to 2.0 based on weather

harvest_timing_shift.description: Days to shift harvest timing (negative = earlier, positive = later)

weather_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations based on weather analysis
